General.Name: Xinfengming Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinfengming Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells polyester filaments. The company also produces and sells purified terephthalic acid (PTA). Its products include PTA, polyester pre-oriented yarn, fully drawn yarn, draw textured yarn, staple fiber, polyester chips, and recycled polyester for use in clothing, home textiles, industrial textiles, and other fields. Xinfengming Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tongxiang, China.
